00019         bool Init();
00020         void Update();
00021         void Freeze()     { m_bFreeze = true; m_iPauseTicks = m_iTicks; }
00022         void Unfreeze();
00023         bool IsFreezed()  { return m_bFreeze; }
00024         float GetFps()    { return m_fFps; }
00025         double GetTime()  { return m_fAspect; } // time in second since start of the program
00026         double GetDelta() { return m_fDelta; }

00028 private:
00029         double m_fAspect;         // aspect between actual number of ticks and num of ticks per second
00030         double m_fAspectLast;
00031         double m_fTicksInv;       // 1/num_of_ticks_per_second

00040 // simple and smal class CBeat ------------------------------------------------+
00041 // create CBeat object, initialise it with a tempo and run Check method to
00042 // verify the beat - if it is true perform action
00043 class CBeat {
00044 public:
00045         CBeat(): m_iT1(0), m_iT2(0), m_fTempo(0.0) { }
00046         CBeat(double fTempo) { SetTempoBPS(fTempo); }
00047         ~CBeat() { }
00048 
00049         bool Check(double fTime) { // usually call Check(g_Timer.getTime());
00050                 m_iT2 = m_iT1; 
00051                 m_iT1 = (unsigned long)(fTime*m_fTempo); 
00052                 return (m_iT1 > m_iT2); 
00053         }
00054 
00055         void SetTempoBPS(double fTempo) { m_fTempo = fTempo; }
00056         void SetTempoBPM(double fTempo) { m_fTempo = fTempo/60.0; }
00057         double GetTempoBPS() { return m_fTempo; }
00058         double GetTempoBPM() { return m_fTempo*60.0; }  
00059 private:
00060         unsigned long m_iT1, m_iT2;
00061         double m_fTempo;
00062 };
